tool_description: This REST API can be used to create, read, update or delete data from the Socie platform.
name: Socie
title: Socie

api_list.name: Get groups
api_list.description: Retrieve all or some groups of your community.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://socie.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/groups"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "socie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://socie.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/groups"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "socie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Member
api_list.description: Return a specific member. To do this, you need the `externalId` you gave the member when you created it or the `id` provided by Socie.

api_list.name: Get Members
api_list.description: Retrieve all or some members of your community.
